import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import Question from './Question'; import './How2Play.css'; function How2Play() { return (

How to Play

There are 100 levels (and maybe more in the future!) to solve in this game. Each level provides mathematical clues that will help the player discover the correct answer to the level. For example:

2 + 4 = x

x + 5 = ?

Using algebra, the answer, indicated by the question mark, is 11. Unfortunately, the clues won't be as simple as the ones in this level, but the underlying concept is quite understandable. Each clue contains different patterns that need to be applied to the rest of the clues in order to complete the level. Naturally, until one level is solved, you may not move on to the next one.

Perhaps most importantly, in order to have the best experience playing this game, please update your browser to the latest version possible.

Good luck and let your skills be put to the test!

One final note: Multiplication and division will be represented as * and / respectively unless otherwise indicated.

) } export default How2Play;
